title: We have our own space at Startup Sauna!
content: We organized our co-working space at Startup Sauna and invited people to join. A great chance to work together, share ideas, and build momentum for upcoming projects.
author: Milana

title: Robot Battery Arrived
content: The battery for our robot finally arrived! Now everyone can experiment hands-on with 'Lindy' and start testing new prototypes and interactions.
author: Milana

title: Partnership with Alif Semiconductor
content: Held a meeting with Alif Semiconductor. They agreed to support us by providing development boards for our community projects.
author: Milana

title: New Custom Computer: Shelby
content: Purchased and configured a powerful custom-built computer, named *Shelby*, to support our compute-intensive research and prototyping tasks.
author: Milana

title: FPGA Expansion and Doublepoint Kits
content: Acquired the Nexys A7 FPGA Trainer Board and established a collaboration with Doublepoint. They kindly agreed to provide us with two developer kits.
author: Milana

title: First Community Meetup
content: Hosted our very first community meetup, bringing together over 70 participants. Great energy, ideas, and momentum for what’s ahead.
author: Milana

title: Organization Officially Registered
content: Thinkin’ Rocks has been officially registered as an organization. A huge step forward in building a strong foundation for our community.
author: Milana

title: First Introduction at Explore Aaltoes
content: Presented Thinkin’ Rocks for the first time at Explore Aaltoes. Shared our vision with 150+ people and received enthusiastic feedback.
author: Milana

title: First Community Computer
content: Acquired our very first shared computer, a Lenovo Legion T5, marking the beginning of our hardware collection.
author: Milana

title: Varjo Partnership and XR Headsets
content: Established a collaboration with Varjo. They generously provided us with three Varjo XR-3 headsets for immersive development and R&D.
author: Milana

title: First Hardware Orders
content: Placed our first major hardware acquisitions: Tenstorrent Blackhole, FPGA boards, Jetson Nano, and Oak-D Pro camera. The lab is starting to take shape!
author: Milana
